scripts.deploy:sepolia: graph codegen && graph deploy --product hosted-service skulltech/nftyfinance-sepolia --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:baseSepolia: graph codegen && graph deploy --product hosted-service crypto-rizzo/nftyfinance-base-sepolia --network base-sepolia
